turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a coffee drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order from the Starbucks located at Shaw and Marks Avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Confirming Starbucks order is from Starbucks location at Shaw and Marks Avenue in Fresno, CA.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a Grande Iced Vanilla Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Grande Iced Vanilla Latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and I want the drink to have light ice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Request for light ice in the grande Iced vanilla Latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want to schedule pick up right away or at a later time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to pick it up at 4:30 p.m.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Confirm pick up for 4:30 p.m.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have a grande iced vanilla latte with light ice.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total is 4.95.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sending the order over now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been sent. Your grande iced vanilla latte with light ice will be ready at the Starbucks at Shaw and Marks in Fresno, CA at 4:30 p.m.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a nice day.
